Fender - American Standard Stratocaster 2013 Fender American Standard Stratocaster Finished in Olympic White! The guitar is in very good condition and free from any major dings, dents, or chips. We found a few small scratches and tiny depressions after exhaustive examination. The guitar features a body made of Alder bolted to a maple neck featuring a C shape profile and a maple fingerboard. Tone is supplied by three single coil custom shop Fat 50's pickups mounted on a three ply pickguard. A chrome 2 point tremolo system with vintage style saddles Keeps things in tune. Yes the tremolo bar is included! as well as the original Fender hard case that has seen some better days but still works to protect the guitar just fine. 7.8lbs IF YOU BUY IT AND YOU ARE NOT HAPPY WE HAVE THE 30 DAY MONEY BACK RETURN POLICY READ BELOW - THANK YOU SOLD AS USED AND AS IS ,BUT YOU DO HAVE 30 DAYS FROM DATE OF DELIVERY TO CONTACT US FOR A REFUND IF YOU ARE NOT HAPPY : Buyer is responsible for shipping charges back to us.
